As a player that spent many thousand hours on the game and consistently getting highest ranks in the seasons that I played, here's the review:

Save your time. Just don't play it.

If you still decide to play, only play when you don't know what you are doing.

Overwatch 1 was cool for at least 2 years. Many questionable updates afterwards that made me thought Jeff wasn't doing great until Aaron came along showing us how to REALLY do it wrong.

Overwatch 2 had a couple weeks of fun time during beta, after the official launch it's just a pile of shit getting bigger and stinkier each patch in a pace much slower than they promised it would. (At this point I don't even know if this is good or bad anymore.)

The last time they rolled out a good patch is .. let me see .. about 6 years ago. I still stayed and played a lot more, but after a while it's just a bad habit that you can't get rid of. So don't even start doing it is really the smartest move.

To the devs: I mean come the fk on, you had such an audience, people either want to see beautiful sexy characters, or those that likes to aim and shoot, or simply both. How hard can it be to make a game better for these simple audiences? Now is still not too late. Even I could probably do it.

All in all it's just one disappointment after another. Casual players, competitive players, pro players, PvE players, each had their fair share of disappointment. Join us only if you want the same :)

fanmade overwatch art ,sfm's and artists made better content than blizzard's hot garbage

Imagine buying overwatch 1 with real money. Then the game changes to free to play and everyone who bought it before is told that they will get many benefits(didn't happen I think). They got rid of lootboxes (the main point of this game was to earn lootboxes). From a nice game it changed to a literally pay to play game (story missions), Overwatch 1 players got nothing and the best part is you can't even  play these new heroes because you have to pay or do a large amount of quests. I guess if you want to play overwatch for the first time go on because you won't notice the change. Idk blizzard how you can literally destroy a top game like that.

Obbiettivamente il gioco Ã¨ fantastico.
I personaggi sono iconici e tutti divertenti da giocare, in questo gioco Ã¨ stato messo davvero tanto cuore e si nota dal doppiaggio perfetto in tantissime lingue e dalle fantastiche cinematiche al livello della pixar, e dal comparto di animazione e character design.
Il game-play Ã¨ divertente e se ti prende bene con un gruppo di amici ci potresti giocare per anni (Non sapete quante persone fantastiche ho conosciuto e ora sono diventati degli ottimi amici).
Vi consiglio fermamente di provarlo anche perchÃ© Ã¨ gratis e con il fatto che sia pure su Steam non ci sono motivi per non dargli neanche una possibilitÃ .
Buona avventura.
